price: 15. Maka Kami selamatkan Nuh dan orang-orang yang berada di kapal itu, dan Kami jadikan (peristiwa) itu sebagai pelajaran bagi semua manusia.
arabic: فَأَنجَيۡنَٰهُ وَأَصۡحَٰبَ ٱلسَّفِينَةِ وَجَعَلۡنَٰهَآ ءَايَةٗ لِّلۡعَٰلَمِينَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Sabeq Company
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Sabeq Company, printed in 2016. corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: fa-anjaynāhu wa-aṣḥāba al-safīnati wajaʿalnāhā āyatan lil'ʿālamīna
